meanings.definition: Most pleasing or attractive in appearance
meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden looked the seemliest in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She wore the seemliest dress to the party, catching everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The puppy thought the cat's tail was the seemliest toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the seemliest shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The diamond sparkled in the seemliest way under the bright lights.

meanings.definition: Most appropriate or fitting in a particular situation
meanings.sent1: His seemliest choice was to apologize for the mistake.
meanings.sent2: The seemliest time to plant flowers is in the spring.
meanings.sent3: It seemed seemliest to bring an umbrella on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent4: The seemliest solution to the problem was to ask for help.
meanings.sent5: The seemliest path through the forest was marked by colorful flowers.
